Reviews.Title: Professional Dome Indoor 600TVL Surveillance Video CCTV Security Camera -...
Reviews.Author: sanjay
Reviews.Content: This camera housing is well build feels sturdy, i purchased two of these on arrival one of the cameras came with the night vision completely not working i am very disappointed with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Again another good deal..
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I am using this as a front door camera to a retail store, need the WDR because of the sunlight off the front windows. Software WDR, hey I would prefer Hardware over software but it's $80.00 should I say anymore, also got this the next day because I am a Prime Member. Overall if it last its a good deal  I could see myself buying a few more..

ProductInfo.Features:
Vari-Focal 3.5~8mm Lens
Lens focus and zoom are adjusted from outside of camera
WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) OSD Menu
Auto Gain Control Auto Electronic Shutter
Low Illumination 0 Lux Great for indoor security
ProductInfo.Name: Professional Dome Indoor 600TVL Surveillance Video CCTV Security Camera - 1/3" Sony CCD, 600 TV Lines, Vari-Focal 3.5~8mm Lens. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Great Image, Great for Entrance.
